title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation.  block-printed; 2 reds and black.  Yellow and blue applied by brush.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 28.5 x 17.5 cm (11 1/4 x 6 7/8 in.)
Repeat H x W: 3 x 3 cm (1 3/16 x 1 3/16 in.)
description: Roses and carnations on picottage diamond grid.
